articles.author: Scott Heidler
articles.title: China's Hubei: 'Epicentre' of coronavirus
articles.description: Hubei province is facing a severe medical situation, according to an official there, as outbreak casts shadow over Chinese Lunar New Year.
articles.content:
The growing coronavirus outbreak is casting a shadow over the Chinese Lunar New Year and causing alarm around the world.
Hubei province - the "epicentre" of the outbreak - is facing a severe medical situation, according to an official there.
Al Jazeera's Sc… [+55 chars]

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Which countries have confirmed cases of new coronavirus?
articles.description: People in more than 10 countries, mostly in Asia, have been diagnosed with the virus, which originated in Wuhan, China.
articles.content:
A new strain of coronavirus is spreading around the world after contaminating food at a market in the central Chinese city of Wuhan.
In China, 41 people have died and 1,287 cases have been recorded on the mainland as the country steps up its response to the … [+5132 chars]

articles.title: A new global epidemic?
articles.description: Questions remain about authorities' response to the coronavirus as number of confirmed cases rises.

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: China battles coronavirus outbreak: All the latest updates
articles.description: Chinese government announces on Saturday that the death toll in the deadly coronavirus outbreak has risen to 41.
articles.content:
China has stepped up its response to a new coronavirus outbreak that has killed 41 people and infected at least 1,287 as of Saturday, placing restrictions on 13 cities, including 12 in Hubei Province - the centre of the outbreak.
At least 36 million people a… [+1182 chars]
